name: Lips
content: I don't wanna know the way down
我不愿知道下坠的方向
I don't wanna know the way down
我不愿知道下坠的方向
In the way you give and take
In the weight that you weigh
In a two three time affair
I don't wanna know the way down
我不愿知道下坠的方向
I don't wanna know the way down
我不愿知道下坠的方向
In the way you give and take
In the weight that you weigh
I don't wanna know the way down
我不愿知道下坠的方向
